kindred.client.view

Class AbstractView

  • Object
    • kindred.client.view.AbstractView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLI, GUI

    public abstract class AbstractView
extends Object
    Abstract class for a user interaction.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Game game
      The game itself.
      protected ResourceBundle gameMsgBundle
      A ResourceBundle used to get game messages in different languages.
      protected int height
      Number of rows of the Map.
      protected Locale locale
      The locale used by the program to show messages to the Client.
      protected ResourceBundle menuMsgBundle
      A ResourceBundle used to get menu messages in different languages.
      protected int width
      Number of columns of the Map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractView()
      Creates an interface to the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract String askForString(String message)
      Asks the user to enter a string.
      abstract void close()
      Closes the user interface.
      abstract void connectionLost()
      Informs the user that the connection to the Server has been lost.
      abstract void connectionResult(boolean success, String serverIP)
      Informs the user whether the connection to the Server was successful or not.
      abstract void displayMap()
      Displays the Map to the user.
      protected String format(ResourceBundle rb, String key, Object[] arg)
      Retrieves a message from the ResourceBundle language according to the specified key and its arguments.
      abstract boolean promptForGameAction(Client client)
      Prompts the user for an action in the game and (if the user chooses a valid action) calls the corresponding method of map.
      abstract String promptForIP()
      Prompts the user for the kindred.server IP.
      abstract boolean promptForMenuAction(Client client)
      Prompts the user for an action in the menu, i.e., while not in a room.
      protected abstract void readLanguageData()
      Reads the files containing the messages in the specified language.
      abstract void remoteEvent(ServerToClientMessage msg)
      Describes a received message from the kindred.server to the kindred.client.
      void setGame(Game game)
      Defines the Game during which this class will interact with the user.

        The game itself.

        Number of columns of the Map.

        A ResourceBundle used to get game messages in different languages.

        A ResourceBundle used to get menu messages in different languages.

        The locale used by the program to show messages to the Client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractView

        public AbstractView()
        Creates an interface to the user.

        The implementing subclasses must implement methods to display a Map to the users and to get their actions.

    • Method Detail

      • readLanguageData

        protected abstract void readLanguageData()
        Reads the files containing the messages in the specified language.

      • askForString

        public abstract String askForString(String message)
        Asks the user to enter a string.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be shown to the user
        Returns:
        the string provided by the used after removing trailing whitespace characters

      • setGame

        public void setGame(Game game)
        Defines the Game during which this class will interact with the user.
        Parameters:
        game - the Game during which this class will interact with the user.

      • promptForIP

        public abstract String promptForIP()
        Prompts the user for the kindred.server IP.
        Returns:
        the kindred.server IP

      • connectionResult

        public abstract void connectionResult(boolean success,
                                      String serverIP)
        Informs the user whether the connection to the Server was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        success - true if the connection was successful or false otherwise
        serverIP - the kindred.server IP

      • connectionLost

        public abstract void connectionLost()
        Informs the user that the connection to the Server has been lost.

      • promptForMenuAction

        public abstract boolean promptForMenuAction(Client client)
        Prompts the user for an action in the menu, i.e., while not in a room.
        Parameters:
        client - the user's Client object whose methods will be called
        Returns:
        false if the action is quit, or true otherwise

      • promptForGameAction

        public abstract boolean promptForGameAction(Client client)
        Prompts the user for an action in the game and (if the user chooses a valid action) calls the corresponding method of map.
        Parameters:
        client - the user's Client object whose methods will be called
        Returns:
        true if the user has finished their turn, or false otherwise

      • remoteEvent

        public abstract void remoteEvent(ServerToClientMessage msg)
        Describes a received message from the kindred.server to the kindred.client.
        Parameters:
        msg - message received from the kindred.server

      • displayMap

        public abstract void displayMap()
        Displays the Map to the user.

      • format

        protected String format(ResourceBundle rb,
                        String key,
                        Object[] arg)
        Retrieves a message from the ResourceBundle language according to the specified key and its arguments.
        Parameters:
        rb - the ResourceBundle containing messages for a certain language
        key - key to access the language message
        arg - arguments for the specified key
        Returns:
        the formatted String

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Closes the user interface.
